Reviews.Content: stayed month daughter patient university pennsylvania hospital location absolutely perfect accommodations 12 15 minutes hospital morning traffic offer discounted rate patients families kept clean maintained staff friendly helpful couldnt breakfast perfect evening dinner available charge angela manager office morning shared positive remarks customers complaints definite motivator recommend hotel
